name: ztabMDP
description: A simple zig library for defining & solving tabular Markov Descision Processes
readme:
# About

A simple Zig implementation & reimplementation of the relearn c++ project for defining and solving MDPs

#### Mostly going to be used in [phyzx](https://github.com/lab-key/phyzx) So check that out for more examples and use cases
